title: Ridge Racer 6
description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual". Blast through hairpin turns at more than 150 mph as beautiful high-definition graphics and scintillating sounds assault your senses. Ridge Racer™ 6 employs the power of next-generation hardware to deliver exhilarating drift-racing gameplay at even more extreme speeds. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

contentRating.label: E (Everyone)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
